descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Giannis Antetokounmpo comes down the lane and finishes with a one-handed slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Giannis creeps into the lane for a jam) 2021/5/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Giannis creeps into the lane for a jam

videos.description: Bam Adebayo gives it up to Duncan Robinson and he buries the 3-pointer on Khris Middleton.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Robinson eyes a 3-ball over Middleton) 2021/5/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Robinson eyes a 3-ball over Middleton

videos.description: Khris Middleton bounces it to Giannis Antetokounmpo, who rises up for a thunderous jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Giannis mean mugs after hammer dunk) 2021/05/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Giannis mean mugs after hammer dunk

videos.description: Giannis Antetokounmpo battles multiple defenders for a loose ball and then throws down a two-handed dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Giannis fights for ball, finishes with the dunk) 2021/05/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Giannis fights for ball, finishes with the dunk

videos.description: Duncan Robinson shows off his range with a long 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Robinson fired up after deep 3-pointer) 2021/05/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Robinson fired up after deep 3-pointer

videos.description: Giannis Antetokounmpo appears to have hurt his arm running into Bam Adebayo's screen in the fourth quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Giannis shaken up after running into screen) 2021/05/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Giannis shaken up after running into screen

videos.description: Jimmy Butler is shaken up falling to the floor after Brook Lopez fouls him.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Butler lands hard after Lopez's foul) 2021/05/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Butler lands hard after Lopez's foul

videos.description: Jimmy Butler comes up clutch with a drive and layup to tie the game as regulation ends.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Butler forces OT with layup at the buzzer) 2021/05/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Butler forces OT with layup at the buzzer
